attributes.action: Stop the use of surveillance techniques to increase revenue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tired of questionable surveillance techniques used by the authorities to squeeze more cash out the public purse?

Surveillance equipment was first introduced to protect the public. The tables have now turned, cameras are going up everywhere and are simply used to create revenue via questionable means such as speed cameras and parking fines via post.

Welcome to 1984. Lets put and end to the greed that seems to be tearing Britain apart.
